text: Bozdar Wada (, ) is a populated place in Mirwar taluka in Sindh province of Pakistan. It is located approximately 50 kilometers from the city of Khairpur, and approximately 30 kilometers from the ancient Kot Diji fort. == References == == External links == *https://mapcarta.com/14710268 Category:Populated places in Khairpur District
title: Bozdar Wada
